sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const Rating = ({ value, text, color }) => { return (
= 1 ? 'fa-solid fa-star' : value >= 0.5 ? 'fa-solid fa-star-half-stroke' : 'fa-regular fa-star'} > = 2 ?'fa-solid fa-star' : value >= 1.5 ? 'fa-solid fa-star-half-stroke' : 'fa-regular fa-star'} > = 3 ?'fa-solid fa-star' : value >= 2.5 ? 'fa-solid fa-star-half-stroke' : 'fa-regular fa-star'} > = 4 ?'fa-solid fa-star' : value >= 3.5 ? 'fa-solid fa-star-half-stroke' : 'fa-regular fa-star'} > = 5 ?'fa-solid fa-star' : value >= 4.5 ? 'fa-solid fa-star-half-stroke' : 'fa-regular fa-star'} > {text && text} {/* if text ? text : '' */}
) } Rating.defaultProps = { color: 'red' } Rating.PropTypes = { value: PropTypes.number.isRequired, text: PropTypes.string.isRequired, color: PropTypes.string, } export default Rating
